snippet: A J. D. Power executive said that 32 percent of all infotainment-related complaints were a result of voice-recognition errors.
abstract: Research company J D Power cites studies at annual Management Briefing Seminars of the Center for Automotive Research showing that 32 percent of all infotainment-related complaints are result of voice-recognition errors.
lead_paragraph: A J. D. Power executive said that 32 percent of all infotainment-related complaints were a result of voice-recognition errors.

headline.main: Voice Recognition Still a Top Complaint, Study Says
headline.print_headline: Voice Recognition Still a Top Complaint, Study Says
